price: Aduun hanga buufata isheef taheetti deemti, Sun murtee (Rabbii) injifataa, beekaati.
arabic: وَٱلشَّمۡسُ تَجۡرِي لِمُسۡتَقَرّٖ لَّهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقۡدِيرُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wal-shamsu tajrī limus'taqarrin lahā dhālika taqdīru al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
